name: Gathering of the Nephites
description: In the seventeenth year, in the latter end of the year, the people gathered together in the land of Zarahemla and the land between Zarahemla and Bountiful in response to Lachoneus's proclamation. Thousands fortified themselves against their enemies, repented of their sins, and prayed for deliverance.

location.name: Land of Zarahemla
location.description: and the land between Zarahemla and the land Bountiful
